content: 7  /  16   The stroke of the tongue breaketh the bones. Many have fallen by the edge of the sword; but not so many as have fallen by the tongue.	by Bible Found in Tongue Quotes, Share to:
contentWithMarkup:
The stroke of the tongue breaketh the bones. Many have fallen by 
the edge of the sword; but not so many as have fallen by the 
tongue.
